extendedInfo.description: From the creator of HK Flight Info, the best flight info Android app in Hong Kong, Singapore is now the next destination!SG Flight Info shares the same Facebook page with HK Flight Infohttp://www.facebook.com/HKFlightInfoLike us and leave suggestions and comments**************************************NOTICE: 1. Flight Monitoring Service will automatically start on startup ONLY if the service was running before previous shutdown. You can disable this feature in the Setting page.2. NO data will be used if there is no active flight added to the watch list even the monitoring service is running. (Active flight means the flight is not yet arrived or departed)3. To STOP the monitoring service, press the stop button on the right upper corner at the WATCH LIST tab.4. Comment and ask on the Facebook page before you rate 1 star. Comments in the Play Store cannot be replied.**************************************Paid version is available for more functions.- Singapore Changi International Airport REAL TIME Flight Information- Fast and User Friendly Interface- Cargo/Passenger Flights of the day before yesterday, yesterday, today and tomorrow can be queried- Search Function (by Flight Number, City Name or Aircraft Type)- Flight Status Monitoring Service (Check every 5 minutes, max 5 flights)- Flight Reminder- Flight History (past 15 flights)- Airline Information- ATC Radio- Airport Floor Map- Flight RadarRequired Permissions:INTERNET- Retrieve data from InternetACCESS_NETWORK_STATE- Check if the phone has Internet connectionVIBRATE- Vibrate on flight status changeREAD_PHONE_STATE- ATC radio will pause when there is incoming phone callWRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE- Cache for airline logoRECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED- Resume Monitoring service after phone boot up (Only if Monitoring service was running before phone previous shutdown)Tag: æ°å å¡ æ¨å® æ©å ´ èªç­ Singapore SIA Changi Airport WSSS Flight ATC Check in
